body:
On Media
By DYLAN BYERS and  HADAS GOLD
6/23/15 5:44 PM EDT
President Obama is glad he used the N-word.
Donald Trump finishes second in a N.H. poll.
Roger Ailes dishes on the future of Fox News.
Greta Van Susteren takes issue with the AP.
Commentary calls foul on Washington Post.
Instagram makes a move to take on Twitter.
Snapchat, WPP plan an ad content agency.
And New York Times editors get really weird.
© 2015 POLITICO LLC

title: Remainders
